ExampleDefinition.Description:
This example demonstrates how to add or remove DataSeries from a SciChart3DSurface in code.
This is achieved by changing the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.SciChart3DSurface~RenderableSeries.html']SciChart3DSurface.RenderableSeries[/url] collection at runtime.
Using toolbar buttons, you can add one or more series and delete the last series.
